name: spotify-playlist-manager
description: Spotify Playlist Manager with brand-based playlist creation

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && rm -rf backend/static/* && mkdir -p backend/static && cp -rv frontend/build/* backend/static/ && echo 'Build files copied to:' && ls -la backend/static/
scripts.start: cd backend && STATIC_DIR=/app/backend/static PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:. gunicorn main:app --workers 4 --worker-class uvicorn.workers.UvicornWorker --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT --timeout 120
